dataList.name: Sin Resistance
dataList.desc: Unless this unit is Staggered or Part Broken, take -50% damage

dataList.name: Resonating Tremor
dataList.desc:
When hit, สร้าง +2 [Vibration] against the Attacker
If the target has [Vibration], สร้าง 2 [Vibration] against all enemies On Hit.
After Attack: if the target is defeated, สร้าง +4 [Vibration] against all enemies

dataList.name: Sin Resistance
dataList.desc: Unless this unit is Staggered or Part Broken, take 80% less [Sinking] damage

dataList.name: Infectious Gloom
dataList.desc:
เริ่มเทิร์น: สร้าง 5 [Sinking] against all enemies except for the one with the most SP
After Attack: if the enemy is defeated, all enemies lose 10 SP; then, สร้าง 3 [Sinking] and +2 [Sinking] Count against all enemies

dataList.name: Teeth
dataList.desc: On Hit, heal 5 HP. 50% chance to สร้าง 1 [Laceration]

dataList.name: Lantern
dataList.desc: Combat Start: if this unit is targeted by 2+ units, ได้รับ 1 [Protection], 1 [ParryingResultUp], and 1 [PlusCoinValueUp]

dataList.name: Censored Courage
dataList.desc: After Attack: if the target is either Staggered or defeated, raise this unit's max HP by 20% of the max HP at เริ่มการเผชิญหน้า (สูงสุด +100%)

dataList.name: Censored Justice
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: if this unit failed to hit with its Attack Skills, raise Min & Max Speed values by 1 และได้รับ 3 [AttackDmgUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: Oddly Uncanny Lantern
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: ได้รับ 1 [Vulnerable] ตามทุก ๆ Identity that targeted this unit (สูงสุด 5)
Combat Start: if all enemies attack this unit, Atk Weight +1
- ได้รับ Offense Level เท่ากับ the number of enemies; when this unit heals, heal 5 additional HP

dataList.name: BLACK Type Weapon
dataList.desc: On Hit, สร้าง both HP and SP damage

dataList.name: Censored Wisdom
dataList.desc: เริ่มเทิร์น: at less than 0 SP, heal 5~20 SP

dataList.name: Censored Temperance
dataList.desc: When hit, ได้รับ 1 [ParryingResultUp] and 1 [Agility] ในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 2)

dataList.name: My Siblings Call to Me
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: ตามทุก ๆ 3% missing HP on self, ได้รับ 1 Offense Level Up. (สูงสุด 5)
จบเทิร์น: ได้รับ +1 Min & Max Speed ในเทิร์นถัดไป ตามทุก ๆ 300 [BloodDinner]
This unit's HP cannot be reduced below 60%.

dataList.name: Hardblood
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: ได้รับ 1 [BloodArmor]
- [BloodArmor] cannot drop below 1
- At 10+ [BloodArmor], convert them to [BloodArmor_2nd].
- At 20+ [BloodArmor_2nd], convert them to [BloodArmor_3rd].
Gain Min & Max Speed based on the Stage of this effect (สูงสุด 2)
If this unit consumes [BloodArmor] and drops below the above thresholds, revert to previous Stages accordingly

dataList.name: They Crave Blood
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: If Panicked, recover from Panic, and ผลาญ 50 [BloodDinner] to ได้รับ 3 [Enhancement]
- If this unit failed to ผลาญ [BloodDinner], ได้รับ 30 [Laceration], 3 [Enhancement], and 2 [AttackDmgUp]

dataList.name: Yearning for Blood
dataList.desc: Combat Start: ได้รับ [Bloodthirst]

dataList.name: More Bloodfeast
dataList.desc: If the target is defeated at the end of this unit's Attack Skill, increase [BloodDinner] by the target's max HP

dataList.name: Observation
dataList.desc:
เริ่มการเผชิญหน้า: apply 1 [ObservedPerson] on all enemies; then, ได้รับ [Breath] Potency and Count เท่ากับ the number of units with [ObservedPerson]

เริ่มเทิร์น: apply 1 [ObservedPerson] against targets without [ObservedPerson]

ตามทุก ๆ 10 [ObservedPerson] on the target, สร้าง + 1 more [Vibration] Potency and Count with this unit's Skills (สูงสุด 3)

dataList.name: Adaptation
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 [Breath] Potency every time this unit สร้างs damage with Attack Skill effects (15 per turn)
- If the target has 15+ [ObservedPerson], ได้รับ 1 additional [Breath] Potency with every hit

Gain +1 [Breath] Count every time this unit takes damage from enemies' Attack Skill effects (15 per turn)
- If the target has 15+ [ObservedPerson], ได้รับ +1 additional [Breath] Count with every hit taken

dataList.name: Defense Mechanism
dataList.desc:
เริ่มเทิร์น: ได้รับ Shield เท่ากับ 30% of missing HP (Shield HP cannot exceed 15% of the max HP)
- If this unit has [Combustion], lose ([Combustion] Count x 1.5)% Shield HP
- Shield takes +30% damage from [Burst] effects, and does not lose [Burst] Count when under 3 [Burst] Count

จบเทิร์น: if the Shield gained due to this effect is destroyed, for the rest of this Encounter, ได้รับ 1 [DefenseDown] ตามทุก ๆ instance the Shield has been destroyed (สูงสุด 5)

dataList.name: Confirmation Bias
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: siphon 10 SP from targets with higher SP than this unit (สูงสุด 3; in descending order of SP; cannot stack on the same target)
(Does not activate if Hohenheim is Panicked)

dataList.name: Establish Hypothesis
dataList.desc:
On Turn 3: gains a new pattern and prepares to use a powerful Skill.
After turn 3 is over: the above effect activates when this unit has 30+ [Breath] Count at จบเทิร์น

If this unit did not take any HP damage during the preparation period before using the powerful Skill, greatly enhance the Skill (does not count damages taken by Shield HP)

dataList.name: Maladaptation
dataList.desc:
When weakened due to a Choice Event, this Passive replaces 「Adaptation」

Gain 1 [Breath] Potency every time this unit สร้างs damage with Attack Skill effects (15 per turn)
- If the target has 15+ [ObservedPerson], ได้รับ 1 additional [Breath] Potency with every hit; however, reduce the target's [ObservedPerson] by 3

Gain +1 [Breath] Count every time this unit takes damage from enemies' Attack Skill effects (15 per turn)
- If the target has 15+ [ObservedPerson], ได้รับ +1 additional [Breath] Count with every hit taken; however, reduce the target's [ObservedPerson] by 3
